alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Haskell; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Haskell, northwestern Callahan, Jones, Shackelford, northeastern Taylor and southwestern Throckmorton Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 930 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Stamford Marina to near Funston. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Stamford, Anson, Albany, Wylie, Tye, Hawley, Lueders, Avoca, Fort Griffin, Potosi, Hamby, Nugent, Lake Stamford Marina, Impact, Funston, The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Farm Road 600, Big Country Baptist Assembly and Mccarty Lake. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 277 and 300. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for west central Texas.
